label: CHD/MI
desc: Respondents that have ever reported having coronary heart disease (CHD) or myocardial infarction (MI)

label: High Blood Pressure
desc: Adults who have been told they have high blood pressure by a doctor, nurse, or other health professional

label: High Cholesterol
desc: Have you EVER been told by a doctor, nurse or other health professional that your blood cholesterol is high?

label: Cholesterol Check
desc: Cholesterol check within past five years

label: BMI
desc: Body Mass Index (BMI)

label: Smoker
desc: Have you smoked at least 100 cigarettes in your entire life? [Note: 5 packs = 100 cigarettes]

label: Stroke
desc: (Ever told) you had a stroke.

label: Diabetes
desc: 0 is no diabetes, 1 is pre-diabetes, and 2 is diabetes

label: Physical Activity
desc: Adults who reported doing physical activity or exercise during the past 30 days other than their regular job

label: Fruit Consumption
desc: Consume Fruit 1 or more times per day

label: Veg Consumption
desc: Consume Vegetables 1 or more times per day

label: Heavy Drinker
desc: Heavy drinkers (adult men having more than 14 drinks per week and adult women having more than 7 drinks per week)

label: Health Care Coverage
desc: o you have any kind of health care coverage, including health insurance, prepaid plans such as HMOs, or government plans such as Medicare, or Indian Health Service?

label: Unaffordable Care
desc: Was there a time in the past 12 months when you needed to see a doctor but could not because of cost?

label: General Health
desc: Would you say that in general your health is:

label: Mental Health
desc: Now thinking about your mental health, which includes stress, depression, and problems with emotions, for how many days during the past 30 days was your mental health not good?

label: Physical Health
desc: Now thinking about your physical health, which includes physical illness and injury, for how many days during the past 30 days was your physical health not good?

label: Walking Difficulty
desc: Do you have serious difficulty walking or climbing stairs?

label: Sex
desc: Indicate sex of respondent.

label: Age
desc: Fourteen-level age category

label: Education
desc: What is the highest grade or year of school you completed?

label: Household Income
desc: Is your annual household income from all sources: (If respondent refuses at any income level, code "Refused.")
